item.title: Daily Digest #05: My Notes on Sam Altman Talk at Stanford
item.description: Sam Altman, OpenAI CEO, spoke to Stanford University students on April 24, 2024. Here are my notes about this informational talk. These points encapsulate his insights into the future of AI, the direction of OpenAI, and the potential societal implications of AI advancements. Enhanced Capabilities of Future AI Models: Sam Altman has indicated that the forthcoming AI model will eclipse the capabilities of GPT-4, signifying a transformative leap in AI evolution.

item.title: Daily Digest #01: Modeling life, underatanding power and Gautam Baid talk
item.description: Date: 2024-04-22 1.Modeling Life: Oscillation Link Bullet points: • Oscillatory behavior refers to a cyclical system behavior that occurs in the human body. • The hypothalamus (H), pituitary gland (P), and gonads (G) are involved in a hormonal feedback loop. • There is a negative feedback loop where increased gonadal hormones inhibit hypothalamus hormones. • This HPG axis can be modeled using differential equations with sigmoid functions. • Oscillations arise from time delays in the feedback loop and steep negative feedback curves.
